thread.title: INSIGHT: Drone debut doesn't go to plan

title: INSIGHT: Drone debut doesn't go to plan
text:
INSIGHT: Drone debut doesn't go to plan 9:24am BST - 00:37 
A Russian postal drone attempting its first parcel delivery has come up against a brick wall, literally. The ceremony was supposed to showcase a new way to deliver mail in a sparsely populated Siberian region. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Russian postal drone attempting its first parcel delivery has come up against a brick wall, literally. The ceremony was supposed to showcase a new way to deliver mail in a sparsely populated Siberian region.
